EmailTemplate.name: 2020_Greenhouse_IMUs_Ongoing-Lead-Dark_Nurture.Email 7: Your free license to HGu
EmailTemplate.subject: Your free license to HGuide Data Reader software is available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Your free license of our HGuide Data Reader software is available. Visualize and plot your inertial or navigation data all in one place with it.
To download it, simply:
- Step 1: Request access to the ‘HoneywellIMU’ project folder on Gitlab <[[https://gitlab.com/HoneywellIMU]]> - Step 2: You’ll be notified by email after you’ve been successfully added - Step 3: Download our HGuide Data Reader software to your computer
Please let us know if you have any issues downloading it by emailing us here <[[mailto:hguide.support@honeywell.com]]>.
We look forward to working with you.
Best, The HGuide Support Team
